6.name: Spider Slayer
6.description: They should have used their eight legs to run away from tougher fighters.

18.name: Sword Master
18.description: A classic weapon that grows more effective in your hand.
18.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a sword.

45.name: Pirate Slayer
45.description: The worst thing to happen to pirates since scurvy and sea monsters.

198.name: Obsidian Sanctum
198.description: Survive the perils of the Obsidian Sanctum.

281.name: Champion Shadow
281.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a thief.

370.name: Behind the Mask
370.requirement: Get transformed into a raccoon by the Skritt Burglar.

409.name: Monthly Tournament Wins
409.description: Clawing your way to first place, one match at at time.

505.name: Maguuman Event Completer
505.requirement: Complete events in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

593.name: Southsun Geyser Sample Collection
593.description: Collect a sample from a geyser on the north end of Driftglass Springs.

616.name: Southsun Omelette Gourmand
616.description: Eat an omelette cooked by castaway chef Owain.

619.name: Crab Toss Participant
619.description: Join in the Southsun Crab Toss.

649.name: The Dragon Bash Experience
649.requirement: You've gotten into the swing of Dragon Bash.

690.name: Master of Heroics
690.description: Joining the ranks of Tyria's greatest heroes.
690.requirement: Reach level 80 with one character on your account.

763.name: Skilled Sprinter
763.description: Use pickup skills on fellow racers in the Sanctum Sprint.

807.name: Humble Victor
807.requirement: Win a third tier challenge with active Frailty and Squeamish gambits.

821.name: Teleportation Facilitator
821.requirement: Help Emissary Vorpp build his portal device.

948.name: Tunnels or Trees
948.requirement: Complete either an Ascalon Catacombs or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

952.name: Mad Science or Mad Gardening
952.requirement: Complete either a Crucible of Eternity or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

1013.name: A Stomping Good Time
1013.requirement: Use 20 Scarecrow or Mad King stomps against players in PvP or WvW.

1089.name: Toxic Spore Sampler
1089.requirement: Bring  spore samples to Marjory at Thunder Ridge Camp.

1145.name: Fractal Fortnight: Aquatic Ruins
1145.requirement: You've completed the Aquatic Ruins fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1245.name: Ringing the Right Notes
1245.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

1308.name: Marionette Sidestepper
1308.requirement: Triumph in the second assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its kick attack.

1570.name: Boss Blitz: Kill Kuraii
1570.requirement: Defeat Kuraii the Cruel during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

1652.name: Chickenado Chaser
1652.requirement: Catch a chicken out of the dust mite twister. Active during the sandstorm at tier 3 or greater.

1675.name: Mordrem Problems
1675.requirement: Successfully complete all five Mordrem events in Iron Marches.

bits.text: Defeat the Gravelash and its cluster of tendrils.
Gather Mordrem samples from the vine chambers.
Rescue the captured workers.
Defeat the Mordrem wolves.
Defeat the Mordrem champion.

1692.name: Buried Treasure: Challenger Cliffs
1692.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in Challenger Cliffs.

1734.name: Ascended Accoutrement
1734.requirement: Unlock these  crafted ascended armor skins in your wardrobe.

1751.name: Rare Regalia
1751.requirement: Unlock all  crafted rare armor skins in your wardrobe.

1778.name: Bloody Prince's Toybox
1778.description:
<c=@flavor>"Ugh. It's my sixth birthday all over again."</c>
—Prince Edrick Thorn
1778.requirement: Unlock all  weapon skins in your wardrobe.
1778.locked_text: Purchase the Bloody Prince's Toy Chest from the Black Lion Weapons Specialist.

1786.name: Strength Without Sacrifice
1786.requirement: Defeat the facet of strength without being stunned or grabbed.

1836.name: Ambassador's Aid
1836.requirement: Assist Ambassador Ikkhit'ch by defending the skritt territory from bandit raiders.

1852.name: Daily WvW Big Spender
1852.requirement: Spend  Badge of Honor in World versus World.

1864.name: Daily Mesmer Winner
1864.requirement: Win  PvP match as a mesmer.

1898.name: Daily Spelunker's Delve Jumping Puzzle
1898.requirement: Complete the Spelunker's Delve jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.

1932.name: Daily Orr Vista Viewer
1932.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
1932.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Orr maps: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore.

2082.name: Dragon Ball Boss
2082.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

2083.name: Crimson Lion Weapon Collection
2083.requirement: Unlock all  Crimson Lion weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2107.name: Daily Engineer or Elementalist Winner
2107.requirement: Win  PvP match as an engineer or elementalist.

2244.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 33
2244.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2296.name: Kraitkin III: Venom
2296.description: The krait are the monsters of the deep—vile, violent, and totally evil. Their slave-raiding parties roam the beaches, and their towers rise from the depths of the sea. Battle these malevolent masters of the ocean in your journey to craft the legendary precursor Venom.

bits.text: Recipe purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Straits of Devastation.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Kessex Hills.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Mount Maelstrom.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Timberline Falls.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Altar in Caledon Forest.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Caledon Forest.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Malchor's Leap.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Sparkfly Fen.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Metrica Province.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Place of Power in Bloodtide Coast.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in the Aquatic Ruins Fractal.
Kill the Veteran Krait Witch in Caledon Forest.
Kill the Champion Krait Witch in Timberline Falls.
Kill the Krait Blood Witch in Kessex Hills.
Kill the Champion Krait Hypnoss in Mount Maelstrom.
Kill a Veteran or Champion Risen Krait Hypnoss.
Kill the Champion Krait Hypnoss in Sparkfly Fen.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2303.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 22
2303.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2306.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki II: The Perfected Spear
2306.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Carcharias has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secret to weighting a weapon head.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to balancing a haft.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2468.name: The Juggernaut III: The Colossus
2468.description: The power of the earth is not only in its strength but in its fluid nature, moving slowly as stone should not move. Collect and bond with the oozes that live in the heart of the world to solve their mysteries and create the legendary precursor The Colossus.

bits.text: A container used to store and combine ooze essences to create a pet ooze. Recipe sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from blood oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from blue oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from red oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from toxic oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from translucent oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from yellow oozes.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from chromatic oozes.
Created by combining ooze essences in the Ooze Terrarium.
Feed Ooze Booze to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. Doctor Bleent in Metrica Province has been conducting brewing experiments on ooze.
Feed Growth Tonic to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. Chieftain Seegor of Degun Shun has been known to offer the brew after helping his tribe.
Feed Mystery Meat to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. A common food enjoyed by norn and charr alike.
Feed a Petri Dish Delight to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. Gastronome Plikk has expanded her selection to include this traditional asuran delicacy.
Feed Murellow Stimulant Snack to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. Rykskott has been known to use this snack while training Murellows in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Feed Experimental Remnant to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. Rakkan offers this food for a reasonable price after defeating the Risen Broodmother in Cursed Shore.
Feed Grumble Cakes to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze. This delightful cake can sometimes be found in the Dragon Chest after defeating the Shatterer.
Created after feeding food items to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and go into the lava at the heart of Mount Maelstrom.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and enter the icy grave while fighting the Claw of Jormag.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get hit by the electrified ground while fighting the Golem Mark II.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get flattened by a Stomper in the Molten Furnace Fractal.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get eaten by the Jellyfish Beast in the Aquatic Ruins Fractal.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and enter the radiation chamber in the Thaumanova Fractal.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and gather all 3 varieties of phytotoxin from the Crimson Jungle Wurm.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and take Agony Damage in the Fractals of the Mists.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get hit by the poisoned environment while fighting Old Tom in the Uncategorized Fractal.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and take damage in Tequatl's watery grave.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and be affected by Corruption while fighting the Risen Priest of Grenth.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and fall for 10 seconds without touching the ground.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get hit by lasers in the Spekk's Laboratory jumping puzzle.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2510.name: Excellent Judge of Character
2510.requirement: Pardon an innocent sylvari held in the Pact encampment.

2519.name: Stealth Bombers
2519.requirement: Use stealth to bomb the reinforced door without triggering any security turrets or contractors within the Underground Facility fractal.

3019.name: Down, Down, Downed
3019.requirement: Survive the fight against the Keep Construct with a reduced playable space.

3028.name: Garen's Defense
3028.description:
<c=@flavor>"Magic is a dangerous thing, especially in the wrong hands."
—Garen
3028.requirement: In Mount Maelstrom, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Priory.

3057.name: Maritime Defense
3057.requirement: Kill  enemy while defending your team's capture points during rated Revenge of the Capricorn matches.

3082.name: The Sky Is Falling
3082.requirement: Complete the instance without being damaged by falling bloodstone shards or their explosions.

3098.name: Destroyer Weapons
3098.requirement: Unlock all  Destroyer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3105.name: Destroying Destroyers
3105.requirement: Fulfill Taimi's request to collect a new Destroyer sample.

3207.name: Elixir Cookin'
3207.requirement: Do what's necessary to make the thaw elixir.

3240.name: Bitterfrost Frontier Insight: Griffin Old Growth
3240.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Bitterfrost Frontier.

3296.name: Voice of the Deceased
3296.description: You gathered evidence of what happened here.

bits.text: Found the locket's owner.
Dug deep.
Confirmed your suspicions.
Found the culprit.

3324.name: Skyhammer Technician
3324.requirement: Earn glory in Skyhammer by completing these achievements.

3326.name: Perfect Execution
3326.requirement: Rescue villagers set by the White Mantle to burn at the stake or escort quaggans near Saidra's Haven.

3333.name: Those Giant Hands
3333.description: Is it dead yet? You think it's going to explode?
3333.requirement: Defeat the Harathi High Sage and the massive earth elemental it summons.

3337.name: Daily Lake Doric: Magic Gatherer
3337.requirement: Gather unbound magic in Lake Doric.

3413.name: Daily Draconis Mons Event Completer
3413.requirement: Complete four events in Draconis Mons.

3437.name: Expensive Taste
3437.requirement: Slay champion Emperor Mattake near Ancient Hollow.

bits.text: Page One: Caught within the Risen Lowlands.
Page Two: Studying the Orrian gorillas.
Page Three: Atop an ancient citadel.
Page Four: Researching wraiths.
Page Five: Supported by scaffolding.
Page Six: Whispers from the wind.
Page Seven: Statues of a fallen god.

3567.name: Fleet of Foot
3567.requirement: Unlock the springer mount by completing the Highjump Ranch task region in the Desert Highlands, and by purchasing a springer saddle from Unja.

3634.name: Open Skies: Crystal Oasis
3634.requirement: Collect  relics to restore the Sunspear sanctuary.

bits.text: Recover this rune from the corrupted facet legendary bounty in Crystal Oasis.
Purchase this relic from Priest Hakim in Crystal Oasis.
Purchase this relic from Priestess Karima in Crystal Oasis.
Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
Collect this egg from the griffon roost in Crystal Oasis.
Collect this egg from a mesa overlooking the Hatari Tablelands in Crystal Oasis.
Collect this egg precariously set atop the Teratohedron in Crystal Oasis.
Collect this egg from atop a pillar around the Sanctum of Nabkha in Crystal Oasis.
Collect this egg from a cliffside nest below the griffon roost in Crystal Oasis.

3801.name: Augury Ascended
3801.requirement: Reach the pinnacle of Augury Rock.

3835.name: Tag!
3835.requirement: Catch the Beast of the Valley five times in a single lap.

3845.name: Elon Riverlands Champion Bounties
3845.requirement: Defeat each Champion bounty in the Elon Riverlands at least once.

bits.text: Adal, Unyielding Firmament
Tohg Atta Awoth
Brandclaw
Dorrik the Wanderer
Morg
Matriarch Talonslayer
Awakened Stray
The Terror of the Sands
First Mate Pekknik
Shoot of Stormbringer

3854.name: Explosives Expert
3854.requirement: Take out 10 Forged with a single mummy bomb.

3857.name: Sulfur Shooter
3857.requirement: Test Creator Jadi's experimental sulfur shooter by using it on, and then killing, a variety of sulfur-damaged Forged.

bits.text: Forged Soldier
Forged Weaponeer
Forged Scavenger
Forged War Mage
Forged Sharpshooter
Forged Shieldbearer
Forged Forerunner
Forged Hookhead

3893.name: The Cutting Edge
3893.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the holosmith's sword, the Cutting Edge.
3893.locked_text: Begin training the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.
Drops from Branded in the Crystal Desert.
Purchase from Assistant Foreman Kofi in the Arid Gladefields of the Elon Riverlands.
As an engineer, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for the Chaotic Leyspark in Destiny's Gorge in the Crystal Oasis.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as an engineer in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Defend the Amnoon farmer-workers from the Forged in the Crystal Oasis.
Explore Kusini Crossing in Crystal Oasis with your jackal.
Drops for engineers from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as an engineer.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3914.name: Mini Raptor Hatchling Collection
3914.requirement: Unlock all Raptor Hatchling miniatures in your wardrobe.

3930.name: Tour of the Labyrinth
3930.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3952.name: Rise of the Crescent
3952.requirement: Unlock  Mordant skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Awakened weapon skins.

3958.name: Corsair Keepsakes
3958.description: Because even a corsair has a soft spot for trinkets.
3958.requirement: Find all of the corsair keepsakes around the flotilla.

bits.text: Alehound's Brewer's Manual
Asef's Brandy
Barud's Spare Gun
Communal Lucky Fistwraps
Halim's Wooden Parrot
Kiango's Spyglass
Mehdi's Prized Hops
Cannonball Stash
Randa's Childhood Toy
Sayida's Sharpened Blade

3971.name: Aerialist
3971.requirement: Jump over Amala's Mystic Wave attack three times without being hit.

3983.name: Mutiny!
3983.requirement: Defeat the three hostile captains of the corsairs.

bits.text: Powderkeg Captain Barud
Stonefist Captain Randa
Alehound Captain Asef

4000.name: Brandstone Research
4000.description: Istan is being bombarded by Brandstones, which may have unique and useful properties.

bits.text: Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.
Assist Yasna with her research in the Astralarium.

4007.name: Not Thirsty
4007.requirement: Destroy 25 Fountains of Joko while raiding the Mordant Crescent Great Hall.

4150.name: Sandswept Isles Insight: Invariant Enclave
4150.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Sandswept Isles.

4198.name: Roller Beetle Training: Gold
4198.requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the gold chest.

4253.name: Trip the Quantum Fantastic
4253.requirement: Disorient  Awakened with the Quantum Mass Displacement Matrix.

4305.name: Pirate Purger
4305.requirement: Kill  pirate in the Crown Pavilion.

4403.name: Exhibit Aye
4403.description: There's enough history in Jahai to fill several museums.
4403.requirement: Find  artifacts for Roenn around Jahai Bluffs.

bits.text: "I seem to remember hearing that every village used to have one of these."
"I wonder if anyone tossed them into the water for good luck."
"Scrolls say heket used to live east of here."
"I've heard this man had an entire garrison named after him."
"Ntouka liked the dry desert to the north."
"These probably have no value except to those trying to scam people, but I still want them."
"I think you can figure out where you might find this."
"Djinn like shiny things. Might be a good place to start."
"The decree was supposedly issued near the great hall."
"Did you know there used to be a way into the Realm of Torment from the Reclaimed Chantry?"
"I can't believe that tree is still standing."
"The scroll trade route went straight from Jahai to Gandara. Search along that path, maybe?"

4446.name: (Annual) Ancient Grudge
4446.requirement: Kill  of Palawa Joko's minions. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4499.name: Surprise Supplies
4499.requirement: Retrieve all Zephyrite supplies, both lost and found, while escorting Pepperseed.

4639.name: Not on the Guest List
4639.requirement: Use the warclaw's Chain Pull skill to damage gates in WvW.

bits.text: Find Any Book Page
Find a book page in the hills of Borlis Pass, Yak's Bend, or Anvil Rock.
Find a book page in Mendon's Gap, Langor Gulch, or Aldon's Ledge.
Find a book page in Anzalias Pass, Quentin Lake, or Wildcreek Run.
Find a book page in Ogrewatch Cut, Durios Gulch, or Klovan Gully.
Find a book page in Orgath Uplands.
Find a book page in Darkrait Inlet.
Find a book page in Molevekian Delve.

4715.name: Cutting Weeds
4715.requirement:
Complete 10 events for the Mist Wardens in Melandru's Lost Domain.
Required to gain access to the Mist Warden quartermaster.

4731.name: Dexterous Dodger
4731.requirement: Defeat Kralkatorrik without triggering any Branded traps.

4791.name: Pool Party
4791.description: Two-stepping together through a puddle of power!
4791.requirement: Dance in the Well of Ahdashim while at least four other raiders are also in the well.

4873.name: (Annual) Slalom Specialist
4873.requirement: Complete  Skimmer Slalom course lap in Labyrinthine Cliffs (race event or adventure). Finishing in the race event grants extra progress. This achievement can be completed once every year.

5005.name: Festival Frequenter
5005.requirement: Acquire an invitation to each annual festival to earn a universal invitation.

5040.name: Legendary Boneskinner
5040.requirement: Kill the boneskinner in the Sanctum Arena.

5119.name: Mystery of the Hidden Tower
5119.requirement: Complete Mystery of the Hidden Tower  times.

5126.name: Vortex, Interrupted
5126.requirement: Interrupt the Whisper of Jormag's Frigid Vortex 5 times in one encounter.

5137.name: High Shaman, High Stakes
5137.requirement: Defeat the Fraenir of Jormag without being downed or defeated.

5211.name: Clad for the North
5211.requirement: Unlock all 18 Runic armor pieces in your wardrobe.

5231.name: Out of the Cold
5231.requirement: Meet the infamous romance novelist Snargle Goldclaw in the Eye of the North.

5308.name: Special Forces
5308.requirement: Unlock  special missions by using Special Mission Documents and Legion Special Mission Documents.

bits.text: Special Mission: Clear the Mine
Special Mission: Clear the Fort
Special Mission: Clear the Village
Special Mission: Clear the Overlook
Special Mission: Clear the Port
Special Mission: Clear the Lighthouse

Special Mission: Pillage the Fort

5341.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-Two
5341.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Two.

5408.name: Tastes like Peppermint
5408.description:
As you drink more, your body is becoming more accustomed to the alteration.
Are you sure you want to do this?
<c=@flavor>"Join me, and you shall have the strength to protect your people in the trials to come."—Jormag</c>
This is but the first step on a long road.

5417.name: Pantheon of the Wild
5417.description: Journal: Pantheon of the Wild Completed
5417.requirement: Complete the story chapter Pantheon of the Wild.

5522.name: Defending Tyria
5522.requirement: Complete the story chapter Defending Tyria.

5589.name: Top Dragon Responder: Fields of Ruin
5589.requirement: Complete  Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5607.name: Lunar Homecoming: Wayfarer Foothills
5607.requirement: Complete events in the Wayfarer Foothills in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

5748.name: Return to Siren's Landing
5748.requirement: Complete  Return to One Path Ends achievements.

5801.name: Return to Arcana Obscura
5801.requirement: Complete the mission Arcana Obscura in Living World Season 2 Episode 8.

5922.name: Return to Descent
5922.requirement: Complete the story mission Descent in Living World Season 4 Episode 6.

5947.name: Renowned Hero: Domain of Kourna
5947.requirement: Complete renown hearts in the Domain of Kourna.

6027.name: Return to Fahranur, the First City
6027.requirement: Complete the story mission Fahranur, the First City in Living World Season 4 Episode 1.

6131.name: Ready Up: Central
6131.requirement: Complete a total of  central meta preparation events.

6138.name: Raptor Runner: Echovald Wilds
6138.description: The descendants of the Kurzicks pride themselves on having such fine control over their mounts as to be able to execute perfectly timed jumps.
6138.requirement: Ride a raptor from the front entrance of Skygazer Cathedral to Saprophyte's Pond and leap over the ledge into the archway in under one minute without dismounting or teleporting.

6142.name: New Kaineng City Explorer
6142.description: You've explored the shining streets and dark alleyways of New Kaineng City.
6142.requirement: Explore all areas in New Kaineng City.

bits.text: Kaineng Docks
Ministry Ward
Naksi Bay
North Lab
Bori Ward
Baedal Hill
Garden Heights
Petrified Woods
Power Plant
Old Kaineng
Grub Lane
Lutgardis Plaza
Sotdae Landing
Cobble Ward
Gwangsan Hill
Soojung Heights

6154.name: For the Living, Not the Dead
6154.description: It's not grave robbing if the dead tell you to do it.
6154.requirement: Loot chests in Valdhertz Crypts to avenge its fallen.

6177.name: New Kaineng Insight: Ministry Ward Waypoint
6177.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6235.name: Always in Working Order
6235.requirement: Complete repair crew escort events in the north and south of New Kaineng.

bits.text: North Repair Crew Escort
South Repair Crew Escort

6244.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Ferndale Stairs
6244.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6293.name: Adept Bladesworn
6293.requirement: Begin training the warrior's bladesworn elite specialization.

6331.name: Seitung Province Mastery
6331.description: In the face of life's adversity, hope, like the resilient cherry blossom, blooms.

6335.name: Master of the Unseen
6335.requirement: Find and open hidden chests throughout Cantha.

6441.name: New Kaineng Insight: Ministry Ward Platform
6441.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6443.name: Reliving the Tragedy
6443.requirement: Regain access to the hidden vault in the depths of Old Kaineng.

6448.name: The Fate of House zu Heltzer
6448.requirement: Work with Valeria to discover the fate of House zu Heltzer of Echovald.

bits.text: Meet with Valeria and accept her request.
Find a pristine Kurzick relic within the rubble in House zu Heltzer.
Return to Valeria with the pristine Kurzick relic.
Pay respects to Countess Danika zu Heltzer at her gravestone.
Return to Valeria in the House zu Heltzer ruins with Danika's tapestry piece.
Track down seven of the zu Heltzer tapestry pieces by completing the Tracing the Tapestry achievement.
Meet with Valeria in Mori Village in Echovald Wilds.
Speak with Valeria in Arborstone.

6454.name: Duct Cleaning
6454.requirement: Use the drone's static discharge ability to clear out vermin hiding in the ducts.

6473.name: Adept Mechanist
6473.requirement: Begin training the engineer's mechanist elite specialization.

6474.name: De-Escalation Training
6474.description: There's a future for you in sales...
6474.requirement: Successfully talk Captain Fa out of arresting you.

6584.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Five
6584.requirement: Complete 12 Adventure Guide: Volume Five achievements.

6601.name: Using Waypoints
6601.requirement:
Travel using a waypoint.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6602.name: Using the Bank
6602.requirement:
Deposit  item in your account bank.

<c=@reminder>The Bank tab of your account vault allows you to store items outside of your inventory and transfer them between characters.</c>

6634.name: Discovering Points of Interest II
6634.requirement:
Discover 5 points of interest in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6692.name: Seeking Scarlet: Twilight Arbor Aetherpath
6692.requirement: Complete the Aetherpath of Twilight Arbor after completing the "Clockwork Chaos" episode.

6782.name: Battle on the Breachmaker
6782.requirement: Complete the story chapter Battle on the Breachmaker.

6797.name: Old Lion's Court
6797.requirement: Complete the Old Lion's Court Strike Mission.

6811.name: League Participator—2v2 Season Eight
6811.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Eight.

6845.name: A Breath of Filtered Air
6845.requirement: Complete each phase of the Jade Crisis meta-event without being affected by the haze.

bits.text: The Hollow
Howling Caves
Jade Pools
Finale

6850.name: Touching Base
6850.requirement: Participate in an event during each base upgrade phase.

bits.text: Jadepillar Point Base Phase 1
Jadepillar Point Base Phase 2
Jadepillar Point Base Phase 3
Behemoth's Gap Base Phase 1
Behemoth's Gap Base Phase 2
Behemoth's Gap Base Phase 3

6861.name: Body-Language Basics
6861.requirement: Follow up with the injured Jade Brotherhood member after aiding Chul-Moo.

6921.name: Emotional Release
6921.requirement: Continue your preparation efforts for combating the ravenous wanderer.

6930.name: Top-Tier Turtle Pilot
6930.requirement: While piloting a siege turtle, collect 10 power orbs in a row without getting hit by the ravenous wanderer's shock waves during the final battle of Gyala Delve.

6937.name: Good Listener
6937.requirement: Listen to all of Captain Thess's optional dialogue in a single playthrough of Silent Surf.

6950.name: Stalwart Serpents
6950.description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal from start to finish without dying.
6950.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and complete the Silent Surf fractal with no one in your group being defeated.

6997.name: The Missing Facet
6997.requirement: Help Mabon and the Astral Ward locate and rescue Lyhr's lost facet.

7080.name: Cursed Shore Rift Hunting
7080.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Cursed Shore.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7124.name: Amnytas Insight: Windy Bluff
7124.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Amnytas.

7165.name: Laugh Like Lyhr Is Watching
7165.requirement: Laugh when Lyhr asks you to join in with him.

7196.name: Sleep Now in the Fire
7196.description: Inscriptions of old say this was how one built resistance to fire.
7196.requirement: Use /sleep inside the molten lava at the top of Droknar's Forge.

7208.name: Solidifying Strength
7208.description: "Don't underestimate Mabon's kind heart, Wayfinder. Last we sparred before the ward, his upperhand knocked my conciousness right in two."
7208.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Strength.

bits.text: Prepare for the Kryptis assault.
Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the camp.
Help Galrath prepare spells for the fight against the Kryptis.
Use the Grimoire of the Arcane to defeat the Kryptis.
Assist Vanak in completing the group spell.
Cull the Kryptis turrets.

7210.name: Jotun Skypiercer
7210.requirement: Learn more about the Bastion of the Celestial and the jotun to acquire a powerful and ancient weapon.

bits.text: Assist in Closing a Tentacle Rift in the Bastion of the Celestial
Summon the Guardian of the Celestial during the Meta-event in Amnytas
Purchase an Essence of the Celestial from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Strength
Complete the Strike Mission in Skywatch Archipelago
Purchase a Transcribed Jotun Runestone from Albin Chronicler in Wayfarer Foothills after Assisting in His Research

7257.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event Week 1—Basic
7257.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help collecting stolen goods!
7257.requirement: Collect stolen Black Lion supplies from thieving skritt during the event.

7265.name: Dungeon Delver: Caudecus's Manor
7265.requirement: Complete any path of the Caudecus's Manor dungeon.

7538.name: Fractal Rush Adept
7538.requirement: Complete  different scale 1–20 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Fractal Scale 1
Fractal Scale 2
Fractal Scale 3
Fractal Scale 4
Fractal Scale 5
Fractal Scale 6
Fractal Scale 7
Fractal Scale 8
Fractal Scale 9
Fractal Scale 10
Fractal Scale 11
Fractal Scale 12
Fractal Scale 13
Fractal Scale 14
Fractal Scale 15
Fractal Scale 16
Fractal Scale 17
Fractal Scale 18
Fractal Scale 19
Fractal Scale 20

7622.name: Cruising Amnytas: Balance to Bastionmere
7622.description: Skyscale dodges can cover a good amount of distance if you need a little boost.
7622.requirement: Ride a skyscale from the southern part of the Bastion of Balance Waypoint to the small lake at Bastionmere at the Bastion of the Natural.

7641.name: WvW Rush Land Claimer
7641.requirement: Claim land for your realm in World versus World.

7670.name: Well-Versed
7670.requirement: Find and read all the notes by Researcher Selly.

bits.text: West of the Waters of Regret.
On the western path of the Ascending Dream.
North of Heitor's Maw.
At the southern beacon.
On a cliff facing Heitor's Gate.
Is that Lieutenant Myros the Spiteful?
Outside the Lost Altar.
A perfect view of the southern extractor.
In front of Heitor's Gate.

7800.name: Inner Nayos Mastery II
7800.description: Now it's more of a dream and less of a nightmare.
7800.requirement: Complete achievements throughout Nyedra Surrounds in Inner Nayos.

7851.name: Artisan of Arms: Mesmer's Rifle
7851.description: Providing ranged support from afar, rifle-wielding mesmers expertly yank allies away from danger.
7851.requirement: Defeat enemies with a rifle as a mesmer.

7925.name: Ultimate Magus
7925.description: Standing on a smoldering pile of your enemies.
7925.requirement: Win  rated arena game as an elementalist.

7947.name: Aurora Glade Veteran
7947.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8037.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 50
8037.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

8043.name: Well-Informed
8043.requirement: Engage in all dialogue options with Arina and Ramses.

8142.name: Master Diver: Siren's Reef
8142.requirement: Find and open a sunken chest at the end of the Siren's Reef fractal.

8164.name: Sulfurous Springs: Titan Toppler
8164.requirement:
Defeat champion titanspawn in Sulfurous Springs.

(Only champions from the "Defeat the Champion Titanspawn" event will increment progress.)

8171.name: Councilbear Courtesy
8171.requirement: Introduce yourself to the kodan council members.

bits.text: Fading Aurora
Graced by Fire
Wry Lichen
Soaring Crest
Vast Caldera
Deft Lahar

8210.name: Weather Conductor
8210.description: The lowlanders are well versed in controlling their environment. Take some notes.
8210.requirement: Complete the "Defend the lightning rods and repair them with scrap from enemies" event without a single lightning rod being destroyed.

8268.name: Returning Kindness
8268.requirement: Bring a gift of wildflower cyser to Deft Lahar and Patient Willow for their help in making a house a home.

8285.name: Void Corrupted Weapon Collection
8285.requirement: Unlock all  Void Corrupted weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8306.name: Friend of the Fish
8306.description: That can't be good for them!
8306.requirement: Rid 20 fish of Greer's rotting pollution.

8326.name: The Falling Star: Crafting License
8326.requirement: Speak with Morgaah Bloodseeker and acquire a list of items needed to create the Meteor-Wielder's Glove.

8352.name: (Repeatable) Janthiri Treasure Hunter
8352.requirement: Sniff out and open  kodan caches.

8410.name: Road of Victory III
8410.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8486.name: Weekly Raids: Janthir Wilds
8486.description: This achievement can help you track which unique raid encounters you have cleared for the week.
8486.requirement: Complete  unique Janthir Wilds raid encounter within a week.

bits.text: Greer, the Blightbringer
Decima, the Stormsinger
Ura, the Steamshrieker

8497.name: Infinite Siege Golem
8497.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Siege Golem.

bits.text: Purchase a siege golem token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase a siege golem mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Capture Stoic Rampart without being hit by Prototype B-055's Shockwave ability.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.
Purchase siege golem parts from the old quaggan near the garrison in Alpine Borderlands.
Salvage parts from the broken down siege golem in Blistering Undercroft.

8548.name: Spare the Ereg
8548.description: Give the youngest Greerling a break. He's new.
8548.requirement: Defeat Greer with challenge mode active without killing the Greerling Ereg.

8593.name: More Than a Little Bit
8593.description: Well...most of it came back clean.
8593.requirement: Finish the Keep the Areas Clear while the Golems Gather Samples event with more than 1 minute remaining on the timer.

8605.name: Mistburned Barrens Renown Mastery
8605.description: The air is tense. It prickles as if imbued by unseen lightning.
8605.requirement: Gain favor by aiding the Tyrian Alliance and your allies at the Alliance Staging Ground.

8616.name: The Wayward Wisp: Vault Dispatch
8616.requirement: On behalf of the Wizard's Vault, investigate rumors of a wayward wisp appearing within Mistburned Barrens.

bits.text: 1. Purchase the Wayward Wisp Quest License from the Wizard's Vault.
2. Speak with Field Archivist Cierle in Mistburned Barrens.
3. Complete events across Mistburned Barrens to draw forth the wayward wisp.
4. Return to Field Archivist Cierle.
5. Ask Valiant Aria for guidance in your pursuit of the wayward wisp.
6. Seek out the wayward wisp. Whenever you're close, use your warclaw's sniff to reveal the wisp.
7. Ask Valiant Aria for guidance to perfect your bond with the wayward wisp.
8. Perfect your bond with the wayward wisp by communing together at the Mastery Insight in the Hidden Sacrarium.
9. Report back to Field Archivist Cierle.

8716.name: Fact Finder
8716.requirement: Locate all of the clues hidden around the abandoned White Mantle camp.

bits.text: Journals
Diary Page 1
Diary Page 2
Scrawled Note
Scroll
Drawing
White Mantle Bow
Barrel of Documents
Alchemical Scales
Map of Janthir

8753.name: Work Hard for Now
8753.requirement: Uncover the tale of a memory-seeking artifact and its true purpose. Note: You will need more than a raptor mount to get this job done.

bits.text: Talk to Astral Ward Medic Miyrna at Bloodcoast Ward in Lion's Arch or at Mantle's Arrival in Bava Nisos to start.
Didn't you have to scale this Monument to have a skyscale egg experience acrophobia? Luckily, we took a small detour to look at some flowers.
Keeping your balance while carrying an explosive keg through the Depths was quite a challenge, not to mention the large wurm heads.
The only thing Hidden about this place was those branches. So many roller beetles were caught on them.
We had our own vista with a view of the Bay, the market, the hylek, and the tengu.
I am thirsty from all the walking we did, but I would not trust any of the Water here.
I couldn't participate in that fest after seeing all those cattle. I'd rather just visit a different Town and have strawberries.
When you thought you were close to the Peak, a dredge would knock you back.
The Prospect of something happening to what you call home is a scary thought.
There sure are a lot of smashed chickens, as if someone was intentionally triggering Cave-ins.
There were so many of them on that bridge, I am surprised they weren't called the Baelfire Legion.
They said "Watch the ledges," so we did. It's a nice view despite seeing the chaos in the Tundra when that ice dragon was around.
How many walls did you think were Bluffing you? I really thought this mountain was the entrance.
I don't know what I hated the most in the Woods: the spiders, the bandit with the pistol, or the skritt that threw bears.
I wanted to Run around this place but felt I was being chased by either a suspicious charr or some anomaly-looking thing.
It was peaceful here in the Meadows, but now you can get a good look at the ruins of a fort and tower.
She thought it was a False hope that we could stop the Twisted Marionette.
Getting to that vista seemed like it was another hidden Garden jumping puzzle back in our day.
If I was participating in Hunger Royale, a Wild idea would be to hang around a potato farm.
We needed to go back to the Coil and look for more clues on this "Mordremoth."
Why did they have so much garlic bread in the catacombs? Do you think we will find more in the Ruins of their city?
You took a break at some Heartwoods, but adventurers were already taking out trolls, boars, bandits, wasps, oakhearts, and spiders.
There's something surreal about hanging around inside an abandoned building, but at least you can hear Owls.
It did not feel good chasing a karka back to a Cavern where there could have been more dangers lying in wait.
If I was on the cliffs, I would be safe from any tidal waves that crashed on the Coast. It would be a disaster if you couldn't find any launch pads in time.
Using the Catacombs as a shortcut probably wasn't the best idea. It's like a maze down there.
Sometimes you were Desperate and needed to get airship support when defending your fort.
To think Mordremoth could destroy a fort so Rapidly, and now we can't use the waypoint anymore!
Have you seen Issormir? That is a large wurm. It is worth the Climb.
Return to Astral Ward Medic Miyrna at Bloodcoast Ward in Lion's Arch or at Mantle's Arrival in Bava Nisos.

I told you somewhere in Tyria, not en Route to a literal Moon. You're looking for a skritt-friend of a skritt friend, which probably is someone that exhibits skritt-like behavior, such as hoarding and appreciating shinies.
